Strings.Text: The elevator cannot be used \nbecause there is no power.{pause}{clear}You need to press the switch \nnext to the door.{pause}
The elevator is already operating. \nThere is no need to operate it.{pause}
It's a panel which fell from the \nfloor above.{pause}
There's an elevator on the other \nside of the shield.{pause}{clear}By using a powerful weapon the \nshield can be destroyed.{pause}
There's an elevator on the other \nside of the shield.{pause}{clear}By using a powerful weapon the \nshield can be destroyed.{pause}
You can go to the surface.{pause}{clear}Will you operate the elevator?{0x3000}
It's an elevator power panel.{pause}{clear}Will you operate the panel?{0x3000}
The elevator is already operating. \nThere is no need to operate it.{pause}
